description.value: The Australian Veteran Status code system defines concepts to support the representation of a person's veteran status. That is, whether a person is serving, or has served, in the Australian Defence Force, as represented by a code. The concepts defined in this code system are equivalent to those defined in the METeOR value domains for Person ADF veteran status code N for http://meteor.aihw.gov.au/content/index.phtml/itemId/737931.

definition.value: The person has never served in the Australian Defence Force.
The person is currently serving in the regular Australian Defence Force.
The person has previously served in the regular Australian Defence Force.
The person is currently serving in the Australian Defence Force reserve.
The person has previously served in the Australian Defence Force reserve.
